knimeNode.name: XCalibur Raw Converter (remote)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts XCalibur(tm) Raw files to open formats: mzML, mzXML or MGF using msconvert invoked via a SOAP webservice

fullDescription.intro: Converts Thermo-Finnigan Raw files (made by XCalibur(tm)) to an open format and loads MS/MS spectra into the output table. Supports multiple files, but they are converted one at time, using a remote web service with the necessary software. The conversion does not take place on your computer: so you don't need to install anything. This service currently uses ProteoWizard's msconvert utility to perform the conversion.
fullDescription.option: Select the files to be converted
Where the converted files are saved
If checked, this node will overwrite existing files otherwise it will abort.
Choose one of mzML (recommended), mzXML or Mascot Generic Format (MGF)

ports.outPort: MS/MS spectra from each file are automatically loaded into the output table, similar to the Spectra Reader node.
Contains descriptive metadata about each file loaded.
